![](../images/calendar.png){style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; width:50%" }
The lab meeting schedule for Semester 1 of the 2025/2026 academic year has been published. The seminars will cover a range of topics related to research training in cognitive psychology and neuroscience, including introductions to functional near-infrared spectroscopy (fNIRS) and eye-tracking, as well as workshops on designing experiments with OpenSesame and using the OpenScience Framework (OSF) for research management.

The first meeting is scheduled for October 2nd, 2025 at 2pm (room TBC), with subsequent meetings planned throughout the semester. The full schedule is accessible via this [link](../training/) (www.themindlab.uk/training/).
